full_summary:
=====================================================

**Innovation for Defence Excellence and Security (IDEaS) Request for Proposal (RFP)**
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Announcement**

 The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites interested vendors to submit proposals for the following RFP:

### RFP Details

*   **RFx ID**: WS3920938864
*   **RFx Title**: Innovation for Defence Excellence and Security (IDEaS)
*   **Publication Date**: March 16, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date**: March 31, 2023, 14:00:00 Eastern Time

### Scope of Work

The contractor will provide management advisory services (Management advisory services; UNSPSC Code 80100000). The scope of work includes Frequency of Events modifications.

### Evaluation Criteria

The tender will be evaluated on a combined rating of technical merit and price (combined rating with highest score).

### Contract Details

*   **Contracting Party**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada
*   **Project Lead**: Department of National Defence (DND), 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada

### Contact Information

Please contact Ngoma Nkiama at ngoma.nkiama@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca for any tender-related inquiries.

**Request for Proposal Documents**

All tender-related documents can be accessed through the PSPC contracting system or obtained by e-mail by contacting the project lead.

**Confidentiality and Proprietary Information**

Please note that any tender-related communication and documents you receive will be treated as confidential and proprietary information. Any unauthorized disclosure or sharing will be considered a breach of this confidentiality agreement.

### Other Information

This tender complies with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

The RFP details, including any modifications and amendments, are available on the PSPC contracting system.

You have until March 31, 2023, to submit your proposal. The expected contract start date is July 31, 2023.
